title: Celestino Emidio (Manuel)
body:
He served as a judge in the district of Funchal for several years and represented Madeira in the legislative session of 1880 to 1881. He was born in 1812 and died in 1898.

Celestino Emidio was the judge who presided over the famous trial of the notorious criminal Jo達o Brand達o.

Funchal: District where he served as a judge
